translations: 倾斜的；有坡度的；成斜坡的
溢出；使溅洒；随意放置；用食物残渣喂（动物）；过分情绪化地说（或写）（slop 的现在分词形式）

sentences.sentence: I managed to pull myself up onto a wet, sloping ledge.
sentences.translation: 我设法爬上了一个潮湿的倾斜岩脊。

sentences.sentence: Sloping walls on the bulk of the building create an optical illusion.
sentences.translation: 大楼主体的斜墙给人造成一种视错觉。

sentences.sentence: Shield volcanoes have very gentle sloping sides.
sentences.translation: 盾状火山的斜坡非常平缓。
